name: Agent Claus
description:
Throughout your time delegating work to the elves, some felt mistreated. Because of this, they decided to steal your hat and work with the government. It’s time to get it back! It won’t be easy since the doors have been locked with the magic of elf hats. You will need to use your blowgun and tranquilizer darts to knock them unconscious and take their hats while sneaking past all of the guards. Get your hat and Save Christmas!

(For the best experience, download the windows executable, it may lag in the browser)

CONTROLS:

WASD to move

Move Mouse to Look

Left Click to Fire Blowgun

(Left) Control or Shift to crouch
